    Multiple Comparison Based on T Test

    MultiCompT.Rd

    Performs t test based multiple comparison on data vectors.

    Super classes

    LearnNonparam::Permutation Test -> LearnNonparam::K Sample Permutation Test -> LearnNonparam::Multiple Comparison -> Multiple Comparison (t test)

    Active bindings

    bonferroni

    Whether to apply bonferroni adjustment.

    Methods

    Public methods

    • MultiCompT$new()

    Inherited methods
    • LearnNonparam::Permutation Test$feed()
    • LearnNonparam::Permutation Test$plot_hist()

    Method new()

    Create a new MultiCompT object.

    Usage

    MultiCompT$new(
  type = c("permu", "approx"),
  bonferroni = TRUE,
  signif_level = 0.05,
  n_permu = NULL,
  scoring = c("none", "rank", "vw", "expon")
)

    Arguments

    type

    a character string specifying the way to calculate p-values, must be one of "permu" (default) or "approx".

    bonferroni

    a logical indicating whether to apply bonferroni adjustment.

    signif_level

    a numeric value between zero and one giving the significance level.

    n_permu

    an integer specifying how many permutations should be used to construct the permutation distribution. If NULL (default) then all permutations are used.

    scoring

    a character string specifying which scoring system to be used, must be one of "none" (default), "rank, "vw" or "expon".

    Returns

    A MultiCompT object.
